items.title: Tensorflow uses memory from both graphic cards but training runs on only one graphic card
items.body:
I am training the neural network on multi-GPU system (2 GPU). I am using only one GPU, but the program use memory from both of them. For using only one card I am using this part of code:

with tf.device('/GPU:0'):

But it still using memory from both of them. What should I do?
